reviewText: I was in middle school during the Kennedy presidency. That was a very innocent time for our country. I've seen many of these programs on youtube and wanted to add it to my collection.

This 1964 documentary was, as I recall, the first full-length biography of JFK made following his assassination, and it still provides a decent overview. The filmmaker later made one of the more interesting "instant documentaries" on the hippie era, "The Hippie Revolt," made when that brief San Francisco movement was at its peak--a very short time indeed.
